name: Fuel Hungry
description:
You are a flame that need to find its way back to the furnace. Grab more fuel along the way to keep your light alive! Watch out for those pesky water droplets though...

Full screen is recommended! If you have performance issues with the web player, try downloading the Windows build.

---

Controls

Move: WASD or Arrow Keys

Jump: Space

Drop down: Press the down direction and hit the jump key to drop through some platforms.

---

I have tested the Windows and Linux build, but I have not tested the Mac build. So if someone tests it and can let me know the verdict I'd appreciate it.
